lead_paragraph: Organizers of the summer festival, which has been produced for 20 years, say the hiatus will be used to reconsider the festival’s mission.

headline.print_headline: New York’s Fringe Festival Will Go on Hiatus for 2017
headline.main: New York International Fringe Festival Will Skip 2017

snippet: Organizers of the summer festival, which has been produced for 20 years, say the hiatus will be used to reconsider the festival’s mission....
